attributes.action: Enforce the high street Banks to act upon the govenrments commitment to provide a tax payer guarrentee lending scheme before all of the remaining small viable business become non-existant.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Loan Guarentees and the new enterprise fund is out there. You can apply for a government backed loan via your bank. 21 words to put a glimmer of hope in to the remaining 'viable' business' who need the governmants assistance to see us through this ression. 
Hands up who have tried and failed. The realistic interpretation of having the backing of a bank equates to the bank backing away.
